name: aws-promjs
description: Decorates AWS SDK to use promises while maintaining exact same API in documentation. If a service hasn't been converted to promises then AWS PromJS will transparently return the original AWS service. JSON config file allows developlers to add/remove services. If a method isn't decorated to return a promise then add it in a aws-promjs.json file in your root. Also the developer may force original methods to be passed in the same way.

scripts.test: echo "Warning: No tests created, I welcome any contributions of test code!" && exit 1

author: Michael Rosata
